description: VHS FORMAT. 1986, Universal / Amblin', item 83842. 1 hour, 21 minutes. Color, animated. Digitally restored. The great animator, Don Bluth, came up with this wonderful animated feature, following the adventures of Fievel, a boy mouse, who comes to America in the 19th century to find a life free from "cat persecution." He eventually winds up in New York Harbor. Voices here include: Dom deLuise, Madeline Kahn, and the wonderful Christopher Plummer, who these days turns up in just about everything. A genuine children's classic.
